<a id="class_CheckBox"></a>

# CheckBox

**Inherits:** [Button](class_button.md) **<** [BaseButton](class_basebutton.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A button that represents a binary choice.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**CheckBox** allows the user to choose one of only two possible options. It's similar to [CheckButton](class_checkbutton.md) in functionality, but it has a different appearance. To follow established UX patterns, it's recommended to use **CheckBox** when toggling it has **no** immediate effect on something. For example, it could be used when toggling it will only do something once a confirmation button is pressed.

See also [BaseButton](class_basebutton.md) which contains common properties and methods associated with this node.

When [BaseButton.button_group](class_basebutton.md#class_BaseButton_property_button_group) specifies a [ButtonGroup](class_buttongroup.md), **CheckBox** changes its appearance to that of a radio button and uses the various ``radio_*`` theme properties.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_color_checkbox_checked_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **checkbox_checked_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_color_checkbox_checked_color)

The color of the checked icon when the checkbox is pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_color_checkbox_unchecked_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](class_color.md) **checkbox_unchecked_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_color_checkbox_unchecked_color)

The color of the unchecked icon when the checkbox is not pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_constant_check_v_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](class_int.md) **check_v_offset** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_constant_check_v_offset)

The vertical offset used when rendering the check icons (in pixels).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_icon_checked"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **checked** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_icon_checked)

The check icon to display when the **CheckBox** is checked.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_icon_checked_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **checked_disabled** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_icon_checked_disabled)

The check icon to display when the **CheckBox** is checked and is disabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_icon_radio_checked"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **radio_checked** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_icon_radio_checked)

The check icon to display when the **CheckBox** is configured as a radio button and is checked.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_icon_radio_checked_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **radio_checked_disabled** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_icon_radio_checked_disabled)

The check icon to display when the **CheckBox** is configured as a radio button, is disabled, and is unchecked.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_icon_radio_unchecked"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **radio_unchecked** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_icon_radio_unchecked)

The check icon to display when the **CheckBox** is configured as a radio button and is unchecked.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_icon_radio_unchecked_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **radio_unchecked_disabled** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_icon_radio_unchecked_disabled)

The check icon to display when the **CheckBox** is configured as a radio button, is disabled, and is unchecked.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_icon_unchecked"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **unchecked** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_icon_unchecked)

The check icon to display when the **CheckBox** is unchecked.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_CheckBox_theme_icon_unchecked_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **unchecked_disabled** [ðŸ”—](#class_CheckBox_theme_icon_unchecked_disabled)
